channel.title: Solitude Servers
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=6][FONT=Impact]Solitude Servers[/FONT][/SIZE]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=178.32.251.100][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/178.32.251.100.png[/img][/url][/CENTER]
[B]Download:[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?pcvg1ydc2q2dmay]Solitude Client[/url] (3 MB)
[B]Scan:[/B] [url=https://www.virustotal.com/file/26d39686ccf0a94b17727bc09385458e61e8cbf4f10d0dc1e4ab513a1580c8dd/analysis/1355592377/]Virus Scan[/url]
[B]Web Client:[/B] [url=http://www.solitudeservers.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url]
[B]Features:[/B]
Loading 737 Cache Web Client Ready Full audio/sounds/songs/speach All Dominion Glove Specials Work Golitath, Spellcasters and Swifts 100% working magic attacks King black dragon Perfect Theiving, with delay and sides. New Saradomin Amulets Whisper, Murmur and Hiss Bandos helmet, Bandos Gloves, Bandos Boots, Armadyl's Crossbow, Armadyl's Buckler Ranks: Donator, Extreme Donator and Helper (With all unique crowns!) Revenants and Glacors with working Drops Pvp Armors for Revs Glaivens, Steadfasts and Ragefire Boots for Glacors Custom loyalty program with loyalty shop (Every 30 minutes players get a notification in the chat box that they receive 250 Loyalty points.) Custom Quest Tab, Skills tele, monster tele, etc. All 735+ Monsters such as Nex and Godwars Home is at Varrock Custom Pvp system Pvp spectating Pvp shop Money Pouch Glacors Full slayer tower Bank tabs Curses Working leeches Full GWD Nex Nex Boots and Gloves! & MUCH MUCH MORE
[B]Mini-games:[/B]
Clan Wars Duel Arena Pest Control Fight Pits Castle Wars God Wars Refuge Of Fear Crystal Chest Dominion Tower Squeal Of Fortune Crucible Creations Kiln Zombies
[B]Bosses:[/B]
King Black Dragon Queen Black Dragon Tormented Demons Skeletal Horror Corporal Beast Kiln Nex
[B]Skills:[/B]
Herblore Crafting Cooking Fire-Making Smelting Smithing Summoning Wood-Cutting Fishing Rune-Crafting Mining Thieving Fletching Prayer Slayer
[B]Images:[/B]
[url=http://s636.beta.photobucket.com/user/eaglesvx/library/Solitude]http://s636.beta.photobucket.com/user/eaglesvx/library/Solitude[/url]
[B]Applications:[/B]
If you want to apply for mod please do so on here or the server forums. C&P this format. Items with a (*) are required.
[CODE]*Name: *In-game user: *Age(16 & older): *Time-Zone: *Location(State & Country): *Total amount of time available(Must be 2-3 hrs): *How active are you: *Do you have a forum account on our website?: *If so what is your forum user-name?: Why should we choose you?: Are you easily angered?: Are you willing to help support the community?:[/CODE]
